overview: An imitation, but an artistic entity of its own; the film follows a day in the life of a French girl living in Scotland. Created in the style of Jean-Pierre Jeunet's 'Amelie'.  Part of a collection of imitations based on the context of learning 'process' through the process of imitation.  Purchased by Aberdeen Art Gallery for permanent collection.
title: Le Fabuleux Destin d'Alexandra Tautin
